items.q: My father likes to cook. ________________________ makes dinner on Sundays.
Natasha and her brother are twins. ________________________ were born three minutes apart.
The weather is terrible! ________________________ is cold and rainy.
My best friend and I go to the mall often. ________________________ like to shop.
You have to see my new camera! I'm sure ________________________ will like it.
Peter and ________________________ family have a party every Sunday.
We don't know where we can park ________________________ car.
My cat likes ________________________ new toys.
My uncle spends all ________________________ free time reading.
The students are having ________________________ annual book sale this weekend.
Two good friends of mine, Lori and Greg, are singers. ________________________ play all kinds of music.
Lori also writes songs. ________________________ songs are mainly about her friends.
Greg plays the guitar and sings. Sometimes ________________________ plays the piano, too.
My sister and I go to see them play on Friday nights. ________________________ always get there early, so we can have good seats.
You should go to one of ________________________ shows!
Olga lives in _____ in Colombia. a. a small town b. a town small c. town small d. small town
Justin has _____. a. a guitar green b. guitar green c. a green guitar d. green guitar
The sky _____ today. a. is clear and blue b. clear and blue is c. clear and is blue d. blue and clear is
Anna's _____ is _____. a. dessert favorite, chocolate cake b. favorite dessert, chocolate cake c. dessert favorite, cake chocolate d. favorite dessert, cake chocolate
Tom likes to _____. a. eat food Japanese b. food Japanese eat c. food eat Japanese d. eat Japanese food
Diego and his wife live in _____ in the country. a. a large house b. a house large c. house a large d. large a house
There is _____ in the sky tonight. a. a moon full b. moon full c. full a moon d. a full moon
Steve and Alice want to _____. a. buy new a car b. buy a new car c. buy a car new d. buy new car a
Nicole drinks a lot of _____ before she exercises. a. water cold b. cold waters c. cold water d. colds water
Roger goes to dinner with his _____ at least once a month. a. friends closest b. closest friends c. friend closests d. friends closests
Many visitors travel to Boston to see the _____ sites. a. historic b. opinion c. afternoon
If you have a very _____ temperature, you should see your doctor. a. ideal b. headache c. high
We learned how to prepare _____ emergencies during our school orientation. a. on b. to c. for
My grandmother _____ a delicious meal every Sunday evening. a. spends b. serves c. follows
My _____ weekend is relaxing at home with my family. a. afternoon b. downtown c. ideal
What is the main topic of this paragraph? a. The writer likes his grandfather's stories. b. The writer works on his grandfather's farm. c. The writer wants to visit his grandfather.

What is the topic sentence? a. He tells me fascinating things about his childhood. b. I love listening to my grandfather tell stories. c. I am so lucky that my grandfather shares these interesting stories with me.
What are two adjectives in this paragraph? a. childhood, lucky b. beautiful, squirmed c. fascinating, deep
consider _____
come from _____
prepare _____ for dinner
have _____
move _____ around the room
organize _____ on your desk
take _____
spend _____
follow _____
(city / a / Cairo / is / to visit / great) _________________________
(lots of / lights / buildings / are / big / there / and / bright) _________________________
(restaurant / sushi / our / serves / amazing / favorite) ______________________________
(many / cool / are / stores / downtown / electronics / there) ____________________________
(Tokyo's bullet train / one of the / in the world / is / fastest trains) ______________________________
Tonight we are having fish and vegetables. The fish is fresh and the vegetables are green. ________________________________________
Emma took the pie out of the oven. The pie was hot. ________________________________________
Anthony has a dog. The dog is large. The dog is friendly. ________________________________________
I like this restaurant. It is new. It is Mexican. ________________________________________
Look at this picture! It is beautiful. ________________________________________
A paragraph has three main parts: the topic sentence, the body, and a concluding sentence .
The concluding sentence is the first sentence that tells the main idea of the whole paragraph.
The body of a paragraph has sentences with information that support the topic sentence.
It is important to indent the first line of every paragraph.
The topic sentence and the concluding sentence should have something in common.
There was a major accident on the highway today. Traffic was backed up for hours.
An opinion is a statement of fact.
I have class in the afternoon . It begins at 9:00 a.m. and lasts for an hour.
We bought a sofa and a chair at the furniture store.
My grocery store sells a variety of fruits. There are more than 20 different types of fruit there!
Write about an interesting country. What do you know about it? Do you want to visit this country? Why or why not?
